net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.data

Interface RowModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MTable.SortableModel, RowModelImpl

    public interface RowModel
    Defines row properties for a Table or a Tree.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

      • getRow

        Row getRow(Table table,
         int row)
        Get the Row object for a table row. Do not modify the object returned from this method, it may be shared.
        Parameters:
        table - the table component.
        row - the model row index.
        Returns:
        Row.
